title: Dark Web Monitoring
description: A threat intelligence analyst is monitoring dark web markets for stolen company credentials.

tasks.description: Regularly and safely browse known dark web forums and marketplaces where stolen data is sold.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst maintains situational awareness of the dark web landscape.

tasks.description: Search for any mentions of the company's name or employee email domains.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst runs regular searches for company-specific keywords.

tasks.description: Discover a newly posted database of credentials from a third-party site breach that includes several company email addresses and passwords, and then trigger an internal incident response.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst proactively discovers a data breach and initiates a response to mitigate the risk.
